basics.name: Mattias Axell
basics.label: Head of Customer Experience & Chief Technology Officer
basics.summary: I have been developing products, services and organizations since my first work experience in 2007 through a multiplicity of different roles. As a contributor to processes, organizations and initiatives I bring a developmental mindset and fresh perspective. I strive to embed Regenerative Thinking in all my work and engagement. My passion is to redesign and impact different kinds of systems to make regenerative development possible. I wish to contribute to solutions which combine the development of technical, human, social and thinking capacity. I believe that the only limit to solving problems and challenges is our thinking and ways of approaching them. My aim is to create healthier, holistic, regenerative systems in order to grow and expand life and consciousness.

work.name: MetaSolutions AB
work.summary: Leading customer experience, education programs, and strategic advising for EntryScape — an open-source platform for information management, metadata, and enterprise architecture.
highlights: Increased customer satisfaction by double digits
Developed and launched a new training program that increased EntryScape usage by 30%
Provide strategic advice and training to customers in metadata management, information modeling, and enterprise architecture
Speak at conferences and events about EntryScape and its benefits

work.name: MetaSolutions AB
work.summary: Built long-term customer relationships and ensured maximum value from EntryScape, an open-source software for information management.
highlights: Responsible for onboarding, training, and troubleshooting
Identified and implemented product improvements based on customer feedback
Helped customers achieve significant business improvements through better use of the platform

work.name: Handlingar.se (Open Knowledge Sweden)
work.summary: Technical leader connecting technology with user benefits and non-profit forces. Focus on public documents, diaries, e-diaries, and disclosure. Building an open central platform that makes public documents easily accessible, reduces costs, increases quality, and creates societal value and collective intelligence.
highlights: Making Sweden smarter by publishing more questions and information on the platform
Reducing pressure on authorities while increasing benefit for citizens and taxpayers
Competing against unnecessary secrecy and monetization of public documents

work.name: Väddö Folkhögskola
work.summary: Educating people aspiring to learn social entrepreneurship, developmental thinking, process work and change processes.

work.name: Tarvalley
work.summary: Producer and project lead for 3D, 2D, AR, VR and visualization projects with various clients.

education.area: Social Entrepreneurship, Innovation, Project Management, Business Administration and Management
